duties_responsibilities.duty: Build the front-end of the sales funnel for inbound leads from multiple channels such as website, webinars, events, and other engagements.
Serve as the first point of contact of Mastercard D&S to prospect stakeholders from mid-level to C-suite.
Work directly with D&S sales team to convert leads into opportunities.
Ensure leads from new accounts are qualified and relevant to the business.
Leverage knowledge of Mastercard D&S capabilities to understand the relevance of solutions to potential clients.
Track the leads and conversion process from beginning to end to quantify impact of efforts.
Collaborate with stakeholders across Mastercard to obtain qualitative feedback on inbound lead process to build improvements to the process.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Sales, Marketing, or a related field
